title: Mohsin Naqvi takes stern action against corruption, agent mafia; orders removal of Incharge Passport Office Muzaffargarh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 27 (APP):Federal Minister for Interior Mohsin Naqvi has taken stern action against corruption and agent mafia by removing Incharge Passport Office Muzaffargarh Shahid Iqbal from his post.
Mohsin Naqvi ordered disciplinary action against In-charge Passport Office Muzaffargarh, stating that there is no room for corruption in the department.
He further reiterated that strict action will be taken without discrimination on the complaints against agent mafia or corruption.
He emphasized that corruption will not be tolerated under any circumstances during provision of the services to masses.
